Armslist is where people post of their wares and you message to meet them up and complete the transaction. It's worth noting that Armslist charges a $6.99 membership fee to join which allows you to message sellers and post your own guns for sale."}, {'url': 'https://www.paypal-community.com/t5/Disputes-and-Limitations/I-accidentally-purchased-tools-from-a-scam-website-How-do-I/td-p/2096040', 'content': "I get an error when I try to use the resolution center to report a problem:
We’re sorry, you can’t file a case on this type of transaction. There was a running shoe store with 40% off... a bit more realistic sale and I was about to make a purchase but then I realized it was the same scam. The fellow is a known scammer and I have forwarded paypal info proving that yet they seem to continue to enable him?
Haven't Found your Answer?
 I guess I'll have to start calling and get used to being on hold, if I can get through to someone.
 So I have been disputing this w/ paypal for about 3 weeks now and they keep moving the expected resolution dates up and up.
Is this normal for Paypal?"}, {'url': 'https://www.reddit.com/r/Scams/comments/qfqdhu/i_just_bought_hoka_shoes_from_this_website_did_i/', 'content': 'New comments cannot be posted and votes cannot be cast. 18 votes, 71 comments. 749K subscribers in the Scams community. Welcome to r/scams. This is an educational subreddit focused on scams. It is our hope….'}, {'url': 'https://www.bbb.org/all/social-media-scams/think-twice-before-buying-from-these-social-media-ads', 'content': 'How the scam works
Look out for these common scams reported to BBB Scam Tracker:
Products that claim to support charity:
As you scroll through your Facebook or Instagram feed, you see an ad from a small business selling adorable jewelry, t-shirts, or other merchandise. In fact, the\xa02022 BBB Online Scams Report\xa0found that online purchase scams were the most common cons reported to Scam Tracker and the category with the most victims.
 Before you sign up for these “limited time offers,” research the company online, see if there are any other consumer complaints, and read the terms and conditions you agree to carefully. Check the “About Us” or “Contact Us” information on the company’s website to see if they contain actual contact details for the business. If you purchase any of these products, you may risk not only receiving a poor quality product, but it may not meet environmental and safety regulations either.
See more about\xa0counterfeit product scams.

thought: The search results don't seem to include direct reviews of the URL in question, but they do mention experiences with similar scam websites, and there's information about being cautious with online purchases, which is relevant to our analysis. However, this doesn't give us a definitive answer about the legitimacy of "deer.guywhenand.shop."

There appears to be no information or discussions on Reddit regarding "deer.guywhenand.shop," which could mean the site is not well-known or hasn't been reported as a scam within the Reddit community. However, the lack of information could also mean that the site is relatively new or not widely used.

The DNS record for guywhenand.shop shows an HINFO record with "RFC8482", which doesn't provide any meaningful information about the hosting or the setup of the DNS. This is unusual because typically, one would expect to see A records or MX records that provide information about the IP addresses or mail servers. The lack of information here is a red flag. Given the suspiciously low prices, the lack of concrete reviews, the error encountered when trying to retrieve WHOIS data twice, and the unusual DNS records, there are enough red flags to consider the website potentially fraudulent. I should now decide if these observations are sufficient to classify the website as a scam. I now know the final answer. Based on the given characteristics of scam websites and the observations made during the analysis, it is likely that "https://deer.guywhenand.shop/" is a scam website.
